me.text:
Gude! I was born on January 29, 1996, in Aschaffenburg, and I am working on making the internet RAD (Resilient, Accessible, and Delightful).
I live in Cologne-Ehrenfeld and currently work at voize.

tasks: Architecting and developing advanced features for the internal device management platform, streamlining operations across distributed hardware infrastructure
Spearheading enhancements to the AI training platform, empowering the data science team to accelerate machine learning model development and deployment
Designed and implemented a robust technology stack and scalable architecture for a next-generation OpenGov ticketing system, enabling seamless citizen engagement
Built and optimized a high-availability Kubernetes infrastructure from the ground up, delivering enterprise-grade SaaS solutions with 99.9% uptime

stations.role: Full Stack Web Developer - Working student - till December 2023
tasks: Engineered cutting-edge features for the Shift Studio frontend using React, significantly improving user experience and platform functionality
Developed a comprehensive admin dashboard with Remix and Deno, providing real-time monitoring and analytics for Shift Studio instances and performance metrics

stations.role: Full Stack Web Developer - Working student
tasks: Delivered innovative features across multiple codebases, contributing to diverse client projects and enhancing platform capabilities
Resolved critical bugs and performance issues across various microservices, ensuring system reliability and optimal user experience
Crafted robust full-stack solutions using TypeScript, delivering high-quality applications across multiple client projects and internal tools
Modernized entire server infrastructure through Docker containerization, improving deployment efficiency and system scalability
Streamlined internal development workflows and technical processes, reducing deployment time and enhancing team productivity
Co-founded and architected an innovative social food sharing platform using Golang and Flutter, addressing food waste and community building
Led web development initiatives for company website and client projects under the Becurly brand, establishing strong digital presence and client relationships

stations.role: Front- und Backend Web Developer - Werksstudent
tasks: Developed and maintained mission-critical systems using Node.js, Deno, Golang, and Python, serving thousands of university students
Conceptualized and built 'Zimmerfrei', a comprehensive housing exchange platform for the University of Bonn, connecting students with accommodation solutions
Enhanced the electronic semester ticket reimbursement system, streamlining administrative processes and improving student experience
